name: Candy Garden Legend
description:
Go on a sweet journey. Travel through Candy Garden Legend!
Candy Garden Legend is a classical match 3 puzzle game to kill time for the adult to kids of all ages. Brand new visual effect and attractive UI designed. Discovered like a delicious dessert menu. Bread, cake, chocolate and colorful candies can increase your appetite while you are playing! You just need to match 3 candies of the same color. Then remove three or more and crash. Collect cake and bread can help you pass the levels easily. Simple to start but challenging to master! No time limited that you can play anywhere & anytime offline and share it with your friends.

Candy Garden Legend Features:
- Addictive match 3 puzzle game
- 300 levels full of fun
- Well-designed tasty UI & Cute character
- Be careful with: Cake, Chocolate, Batten, Ice layer, Honey, Fuzzy Ball, Cable
- Travel through 6 sweet scene: Creamy House , Lollipop Villa, Donut Park, Gummy Desert, Sweets Factory, Golden Shed

Join Candy Garden Legend and download it for FREE. Start your adventure on this dessert journey NOW!!
